QuestData.Title: Seein' Red
QuestData.Description: I was just about ta curl up an' die, mon.$b$bNow, dis!$b$bSnuff an' me go way back. Oh, da memories...$b$bNo way I can face Snuff in da afterlife without avengin' his death first, mon!$b$bDese hooligans be led by one named Konk. We gotta sniff him out an' den snuff him out - for Snuff!
